title: Enter our $50,000 Dataviz Challenge
content:
We’ve launched a creative dataviz challenge in partnership with the World Government Summit.

We’re supplying the datasets and concepts. You provide data-visualizations, infographics or interactives that tell a story or reveal something interesting about the data.

The theme is past, present and future – of society, of governments, of populations. What trends could we learn from? What’s happening now? What does the future hold?

Winners receive cash prizes of up to $25,000 from a total prize pot of $50,000K! They’ll also have their work exhibited at the summit in Feb 2023.

Closing date is Feb 1st 11:59 AST.

» More info, FAQs and submission details

Remember to read the creative direction!
author: David McCandless
